// src/api/chats.ts
import api from'./client';export async function createChat(payload){const res=await api.post('api/chat-service/create',payload);return res.data;}export async function createChatAuto(query,payload){const res=await api.post(`api/chat-service/create-auto?query=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`,payload);console.log();return res.data;}export async function getChat(chatId){const res=await api.get(`api/chat-service/get/${chatId}`);return res.data;}export async function getAllChats(telegramId){const res=await api.get(`api/chat-service/get-all/${telegramId}`);return res.data;}export async function deleteChat(chatId){const url=chatId?`api/chat-service/delete?chat_id=${encodeURIComponent(chatId)}`:'/delete';const res=await api.delete(url);return res.data;}
